Based on the user input and context, improve the instructions for copilot and agent in this repo. Make sure to keep the instructions concise and clear.

When adding new guidelines, make sure you deduplicate them in the following files (leveraging reference links in md) unless you think same content are useful in multiple places depending on the context:
All instructions are in .github folder. 
- repo-wide instructions: .github/copilot-instructions.md
- agent action instructions: .github/agents/engineer.agent.md
- prompt instructions: .github/prompts/self.prompt.md
